explains: n. <美>杀人；谋杀；<美>（警局中的）重案组；<旧>谋杀者

sentences.en: The police arrived at the scene of the homicide.
The statute of limitations on crimes other than homicide is five years, so Reyes cannot be prosecuted for the attack.
sentences.cn: 除杀人罪以外的罪行的诉讼时效为5年，所以雷耶斯不能因为那次袭击被起诉。

sentences.en: It was a clear case of homicide.
sentences.cn: 这是一起确信无疑的谋杀案。
